QuestData.Title: Quickening
QuestData.Description: I've learned more in my short time here than in decades of studies.$b$bThe ancients here are being exposed to incredible levels of arcane energy. It's literally transforming them into something...$b$bI'm confident that there's a final stage in their metamorphosis. Find me some evidence of their final state.
QuestData.LogDescription: Image of Warmage Kaitlyn in the Nexus wants you to collect 5 Arcane Splinters from Crystalline Protectors.
QuestData.CompletionText: The Crystalline Ancients... Do they exist?
QuestData.RewardText: Fascinating!$b$bAnd they're aggressive too, you say. That would suggest that some intelligence is behind this manipulation.$B$BIt may not be natural at all....
